Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of officer's refusal of H&C application
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant lived in Canada illegally for over 20 years, faced multiple rejections
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of humanitarian and compassionate application
Crimes.Court_Ruling: Granted judicial review, remitted for re-determination
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Officer failed to provide adequate reasoning
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Hardship, establishment in Canada, ties to the country
Crimes.Applicable_Legislation: IRPA, sections related to H&C considerations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inadequate reasons provided by decision maker
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Evidence of long-term residence, family ties, integration
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Length of stay, family connections, lack of criminal record
Crimes.Relief_Sought: Permanent residency based on H&C grounds
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Administrative decision must be reasonable and well-explained
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Officer did not properly address relevant evidence
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Significant hardship upon removal from Canada
Crimes.Cause_Description: Overstayed visa and sought permanent residency on H&C grounds
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Relevant evidence was present but not adequately analyzed
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Failure to explain why evidence did not support establishment
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Lack of sufficient reasoning regarding establishment

Crimes.Evidence_Used: Duration of stay, familial and community ties
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Ties to Canada, potential hardship upon removal
Crimes.Governing_Rule: H&C decisions require transparent and logical reasoning
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of meaningful engagement with evidence
Crimes.Outcome: Case set aside and referred back for re-determination
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Severe personal and emotional hardship if removed
Crimes.Cause_Description: H&C application refused due to alleged lack of hardship
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Evidence of establishment not properly weighed
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Failure to assess depth of applicant's roots in Canada
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Omission of key factors in assessment

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal due to failure to establish unusual hardship
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Documentary and testimonial evidence of long-term presence
